metadata.video_title: Italian for Beginners - Everyday Life: Marco's Story
metadata.context: A narrative about Marco's life in Milan, including his work as a barista, hobbies, and family.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.italian_text: Lui si chiama Marco e ha venticinque anni.
dialogue.english_translation: His name is Marco, and he is 25 years old.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.italian_text: Vive a Milano, una città grande e bellissima, conosciuta per la moda e l'architettura.
dialogue.english_translation: He lives in Milan, a large and beautiful city known for fashion and architecture.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.italian_text: Marco lavora come barista in un piccolo caffè vicino casa.
dialogue.english_translation: Marco works as a barista in a small café near his house.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.italian_text: Ogni mattina si alza presto per preparare il caffè e i dolci per i clienti.
dialogue.english_translation: Every morning, he wakes up early to prepare coffee and pastries for the customers.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.italian_text: Nel tempo libero, Marco ama andare al cinema.
dialogue.english_translation: In his free time, Marco loves going to the cinema.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.italian_text: A casa, Marco ha anche un gatto. Si chiama Micio ed è molto affettuoso.
dialogue.english_translation: At home, Marco also has a cat. Its name is Micio, and it is very affectionate.

grammar_concepts.explanation: In Italian, reflexive verbs are used when the subject and object of the verb are the same. Example: 'si alza' means 'he/she wakes up.'
Phrases like 'ogni mattina' (every morning) are used to indicate frequency.

exercises.question: Come si chiama il gatto di Marco?

cultural_notes.description: In Italy, it is common to have a quick coffee (espresso) at the bar counter in small cafés.
cultural_notes.connection_to_dialogue: Marco works as a barista and prepares coffee for customers.

cultural_notes.description: Family ties are very strong in Italian culture, and siblings often have close relationships.
cultural_notes.connection_to_dialogue: Marco and his sister Anna are described as 'molto legati' (very close).
